title: Crashing Computer when i get in game
body: Lately I have been wanting to get back into league but whenever I want to play a game it freezes and this only happens when I first go in game. All my other games work fine I am able to run newer games but for some reason I cant run league, anyone have a fix?

replies.body: A recent Windows 10 update auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html), and has been causing freezing issues for some players.  Disabling that should fix this up!  Let me know if the problem persists.
